H0.text: The fortified wine drink Sherry is named after what town. Jerez

H1.text: The fortified wine drink Sherry is named after what town. Cadiz

H2.text: The fortified wine drink Sherry is named after what town. Malaga

H3.text: The fortified wine drink Sherry is named after what town. Xeres

A4.text: The placename Xerez gave its name to the fortified wine sherry.
